definition: pen/pencil/writing brush/to write or compose/the strokes of Chinese characters/classifier for sums of money, deals/CL:支[zhi1],枝[zhi1]
name/noun (part of speech)/place (e.g. among winners)/famous/classifier for people

sentences.english: Eric Blair wrote under the pseudonym of George Orwell.
sentences.chinese: 喬治奧韋爾爲筆名寫作。

sentences.english: He posts his novels chapter by chapter or in sections online under different pseudonyms as he writes.
sentences.chinese: 他用不同的筆名把他的作品分章節發佈在網上。

sentences.english: Murong Xuecun (moo-rong shweh-tswen) is the pen name of Hao Qun.
sentences.chinese: 慕容雪村的真名叫郝羣，慕容只是他的筆名。

sentences.english: THAM TAI SUN, pen-named Shu Ying, a native of Zhongshan, Guangdong, was born in 1934.
sentences.chinese: 譚帝森，筆名樹影，廣東中山人，一九三四年出生。

sentences.english: The book is published under his pen name.
sentences.chinese: 那本書是以他的筆名出版的。

sentences.english: She has recently published her fourth book with her pen-name.
sentences.chinese: 她最近以筆名出版了她的第四本書籍。

sentences.english: Hello, everybody, My pen name is Lanyu.
sentences.chinese: 大家好，我的筆名叫藍鬱。

sentences.english: Mary wrote the novel under the name of Saki.
sentences.chinese: 瑪麗以沙奇爲筆名從事寫作。
人民網擁有管理筆名和留言的一切權力。

sentences.english: He then changed his name to Yang Mu in 1972 and transformed his writing style.
sentences.chinese: 1972年後改用楊牧爲筆名，作品風格亦爲之一變。

definition: orange peel/tangerine peel/dried orange peel used in Chinese medicine
pavilion with a view/high/tall/high fronted, curtained carriage (old)
surname Zhao/one of the seven states during the Warring States Period (476-220 BC)/the Former Zhao 前趙 (304-329) and Later Zhao 後趙 (319-350), states of the Sixteen Kingdoms
to gallop/to assist/to attack/to wade/great/old variant of 憑|凭[ping2]
one's native place/place of ancestry/registered birthplace
School of Minor-talks, one of the Hundred Schools of Thought 諸子百家|诸子百家[zhu1 zi3 bai3 jia1] during the Warring States Period (475-221 BC)
bow case or scabbard/to hide/military strategy
abbr. for Shijing 詩經|诗经[Shi1 jing1], the Book of Songs
to fast or abstain from meat, wine etc/vegetarian diet/study room/building/to give alms (to a monk)
surname Wu/area comprising southern Jiangsu, northern Zhejiang and Shanghai/name of states in Southern China at different historical periods
